document_data.name: Halvaruth Feirn
document_data.mainbody: '''Halvaruth Feirn''', nicknamed the '''"Stone King"''', was a traveling actor who performed at the famous [[Crown Aflame]] theater in Athkatla in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Halvaruth got his royal nickname thanks to his stoic face that always remained inexpressive like chiseled [[granite]]. Despite that, he acted with his voice masterfully, showing impressive complexity of character and depth of feeling.
document_data.History: Halvaruth Feirn was among several traveling actors who were somewhat popular attractions among posh theatergoers from the [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]]. As of {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Halvaruth was still performing at the Crown Aflame.
